p: Superimposition of the X-ray crystal structures of the main proteases of SARS-CoV-2, SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV indicates a high degree of structural similarity and conservation of the active site ( Fig. 3 ). This might prove valuable for the development of pan-coronaviral drugs and has already been employed for the development of SARS-CoV-2 M pro inhibitors that were based on previous compounds targeting the SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV main proteases.
